desc.cn:
当小队内其他干员的连携技造成伤害时可以发动。
冲到敌人身边，对其造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，并附着<@ba.key>源石结晶</>，在一段时间内将其封印。施加<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>和<#ba.noguard>破防</>会击碎<@ba.key>源石结晶</>并额外造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When another operator in the team deals DMG with combo skills. 
Rushes to the enemy's side to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and attach <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> that temporarily seal them. Applying <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> to the sealed enemy shatters the <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> and deals additional <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。
 
下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
 
处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 使用<@ba.key>源石结晶</>冲击前方一定范围内的敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>和<#ba.crush>猛击</>。
desc.en: A forceful burst of <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> that attacks enemies within the area of effect. Deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and applies <#ba.crush>Crush</>.

desc.cn: 使用<@ba.key>源石结晶</>轰击地面，对前方扇形范围内的敌人造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。如果敌人身上附着<@ba.key>源石结晶</>，则击碎<@ba.key>源石结晶</>并额外造成一次<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
desc.en: Bombards the ground with <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</>, dealing massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to all enemies within a fan-shaped area. If the enemy already has <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> on them, this skill shatters the <@ba.key>Originium Crystals</> and deals 1 more hit of <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

desc.cn:
当主控干员对敌人造成<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>后可以发动。
释放积蓄的电磁能量轰击目标，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>并强制施加短暂的<#ba.conduct>导电</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on any enemy. 
Unleashes stored electro-magnetic energy to bombard the target, dealing <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and forcibly inflicting temporary <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 释放一道电磁能量从空中落下，对小范围内敌人造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>并施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>。
desc.en: Unleashes a bolt of electro-magnetic energy that deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> to enemies in a small area.

desc.cn: 立即传送一块巨大的轨道漂浮物对目标区域进行毁灭性打击，对区域内的敌人造成大量<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。
desc.en: Tele-protocols a massive piece of orbital debris into the battlefield with devastating impact. All enemies in the area of effect suffer massive <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>.

desc.cn:
当有敌人进入<#ba.noguard>破防</>状态时可以发动。
进行穿梭斩击，对路径上的所有敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>和<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy becomes <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. 
A slashing dash that passes through the target enemy and deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.airborne>Lift</> to all enemies along the way.

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 对目标敌人进行上挑攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>和<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
desc.en: Performs an uppercut slash at the target enemy, dealing <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.airborne>Lift</>.

desc.cn: 对目标敌人进行7段斩击，每次造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。最后一段斩击造成的伤害更高。
desc.en: A 7-sequence slash attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> with each sequence to the target enemy. The final slash sequence deals even more DMG.

desc.cn:
当有敌人被施加<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>时可以发动。
向目标所在位置扔出一颗爆裂手雷，手雷落地后爆炸，对附近范围的敌人造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>并施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> is applied to an enemy. 
Throws a frag grenade at the target's location that explodes upon hitting the ground, dealing <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> and <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> to nearby enemies.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 对目标进行连射，造成少量<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>，最后一次射击施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。如果目标处于<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态，则不再施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>，而是<#ba.consume>消耗</>该状态并追加一次射击，造成大量<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。
desc.en: Fires multiple shots at the target that deal some <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>. The final shot also applies <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>. If the target has active <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>, do not apply <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> but instead <#ba.consume>consume</> the Arts Reaction to fire an additional shot that deals massive <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>.

desc.cn: 进行快速射击并施放<@ba.key>狼之怒</>攻击附近敌人，造成5次<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>并强制施加<#ba.burning>燃烧</>。
desc.en: Fire a rapid barrage of shots and unleashes the <@ba.key>Wolven Fury</> to attack nearby enemies, dealing 5 hits of <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> and forcibly applying <#ba.burning>Combustion</>.

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 瞬闪至敌人身边进行2次斩击，造成少量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。若敌人处于<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态，<#ba.consume>消耗</>其<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态并追加一次攻击，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>，然后恢复一定技力。
desc.en: Instantly blinks to the enemy's side to deal 2 slashes that deal some <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. If the enemy has active <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>, <#ba.consume>consume</> the <#ba.conduct>Electrification</> to unleash an additional attack that deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 用电弧包裹自身后向前方冲刺一段距离，对路径上的敌人造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>并施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>。一段时间后，引爆留下的电弧，再次造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>，若敌人处于<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>状态，则会<#ba.consume>消耗</>其<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>并强制施加<#ba.conduct>导电</>。
desc.en: Performs a short forward dash while wreathed in arcs of electricity to deal <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and apply <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> to all enemies in the path. The lingering arcs explode after a short while, dealing another hit of <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>. If the enemy has active <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</>, <#ba.consume>consume</> the <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> and forcibly apply <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>.

desc.cn:
主控干员受到攻击后可以发动。
向目标敌人跳起并重砸，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>和<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>，同时治疗主控干员。意志可以额外提高治疗量。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When the controlled operator is attacked. 
Leaps at the target enemy and unleashes a heavy slam that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> while giving HP treatment to the controlled operator. The attribute of Will increases the amount of HP treatment.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普攻，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
向前方跃起随后重砸，对扇形范围内的所有敌人造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>并<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>。
施放过程中若受到过来自敌人的伤害，命中时额外造成一定失衡。
desc.en:
A leap followed by a heavy slam that deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>, <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</>, and Stagger to all enemies in a fan-shaped area. 
If Ember takes DMG from enemies during casting, the slam deals more Stagger when it hits.

desc.cn: 猛击地面，对附近敌人造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>，同时使全队获得基于余烬最大生命值的<#ba.shield>护盾</>。
desc.en: Slams the ground to deal <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> to nearby enemies, while granting every teammate a <#ba.shield>Shield</> based on Ember's Max HP.

desc.cn:
当<@ba.key>支援晶体</>的生命回复次数耗尽后可以发动。
短暂蓄力后将<@ba.key>支援晶体</>丢向敌人，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When the <@ba.key>Auxiliary Crystal</> uses up its HP treatments. 
Quickly charges up the <@ba.key>Auxiliary Crystal</> and launches it at the enemy to deal <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
召唤<@ba.key>支援晶体</>在一段时间内环绕主控干员。
当主控干员对敌人造成<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>后<@ba.key>支援晶体</>为其回复生命值，该效果最多可触发2次。意志可以额外提高治疗量。
若触发回复时主控干员生命值已满，则额外对其施加一段时间的<#ba.spellenhance>法术增幅</>，该效果无法叠加。
desc.en:
Summons an <@ba.key>Auxiliary Crystal</> that orbits the controlled operator for a while. 
After the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on the enemy, the <@ba.key>Auxiliary Crystal</> will restore the said operator's HP. This effect can trigger 2 times. The attribute of Will increases the amount of HP treatment. 
When the controlled operator is already at Max HP when triggering the HP restoration, grant the said operator a temporary <#ba.spellenhance>Arts Amp</> as well. This effect cannot stack.

desc.cn: 对全队施加一段时间的<#ba.crystenhance>寒冷增幅</>和<#ba.naturalenhance>自然增幅</>，智识可以额外提高该增幅效果。
desc.en: Applies temporary <#ba.crystenhance>Cryo Amp</> and <#ba.naturalenhance>Nature Amp</> to the entire team. The attribute of Intellect increases the Amp effect.

desc.cn:
主控干员对处于<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>或<#ba.conduct>导电</>状态的目标进行<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>后可以发动。
跃起并向目标掷出3支<@ba.key>雷枪</>，并对前方范围内的敌人造成一次<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on a target with active <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> or <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>. 
Leaps into mid-air and throws 3 <@ba.key>Thunderlances</> at the target, then deals 1 hit of <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> to enemies in the area of effect.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
跃起后用枪刮起旋风，对周围的敌人造成少量<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。同时召回全部<@ba.key>雷枪</>、<@ba.key>强雷枪</>。
<@ba.key>雷枪</>被召回时若穿过敌人则对其造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。<@ba.key>强雷枪</>造成更高的<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>，还会施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>。
desc.en:
Leaps into mid-air to stir up a maelstrom with her lance, dealing some <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> to nearby enemies while pulling back all <@ba.key>Thunderlances</> and <@ba.key>Thunderlance EX</> in the battlefield towards herself. 
The returning <@ba.key>Thunderlances</> pierce through all enemies along their paths and deal <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>, while returning <@ba.key>Thunderlances EX</> deal more <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and also apply <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</>.

desc.cn: 向目标区域投下一支<@ba.key>强雷枪</>，对附近敌人造成大量<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。
desc.en: Throws a <@ba.key>Thunderlance EX</> at the target area that deals massive <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> to enemies nearby.

desc.cn:
当有敌人被施加<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>时可以发动。
短暂施法后使目标及附近敌人全部受到重力牵引，对其造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并强制造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reaction</> is applied to an enemy. 
A quick casting of the Arts that generates a gravity pull, which then deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and forcibly <#ba.airborne>Lifts</> the target and nearby enemies.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 进入持续施法状态，在前方产生<@ba.key>重力奇点</>。<@ba.key>重力奇点</>会持续吸引附近的敌人并对其造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。施法结束时<@ba.key>重力奇点</>会爆炸，对范围内的敌人造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>。
desc.en: Initiates Arts channeling that creates a <@ba.key>gravity well</>. The <@ba.key>gravity well</> pulls in nearby enemies and deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> to them. When channeling ends, the <@ba.key>gravity well</> implodes to deal <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> to enemies in the area of effect.

desc.cn:
创造一个<@ba.key>重力紊乱区域</>，对区域内的敌人立即造成一次<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>。处于<@ba.key>重力紊乱区域</>中的目标被施加<#ba.slow>缓速</>和<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>。目标处于<#ba.noguard>破防</>状态时，<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>效果会随<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数额外提升。
<@ba.info>区域内的目标若处于击飞状态，将保持击飞状态直到区域效果结束。</>
desc.en:
Creates an <@ba.key>Anomalous Gravity Field</> that instantly deals 1 hit of <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and applies <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> to enemies caught in the field. Targets in the <@ba.key>Anomalous Gravity Field</> also suffer from <#ba.slow>Slow</> and <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</>. The effect of <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</> is further increased based on the number of active <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks on the target. 
<@ba.info>If a target in the field is Lifted, the Lifted status will persist until the field wears off.</>

当主控干员受到攻击后，如果生命值低于{trigger_hp_ratio:0%}可以发动。
昼雪对其丢出雪地救援助理，触碰到目标时立即大量<@ba.heal>治疗</>附近的干员，并在接下来一段时间内对范围内的干员持续提供<@ba.heal>治疗</>。
意志可以额外提高治疗量。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: After controlled operator gets attacked and drops below {trigger_hp_ratio:0%} HP. 
Snowshine throws a Snowfield SAR Assistant at the controlled operator. Upon target contact, the Assistant gives massive instant <@ba.heal>HP Treatment</> to nearby operators as well as continuous <@ba.heal>HP Treatment</> to operators in the area of effect. 
The attribute of Will increases the amount of HP treatment.

An attack with up to 3 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
架起盾牌格挡攻击，使自身及周围干员获得<#ba.guard>庇护</>，并立即<#ba.return>返还</>一定技力。
若在立盾期间受到攻击，则发动一次反击，尝试对攻击者造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>，并施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
desc.en:
Raises a shield that can block attacks, grants <#ba.guard>Protection</> to self and nearby operators, and immediately <#ba.return>returns</> some SP. 
When attacked while the said shield is raised, perform a retaliation bash that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and applies <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> on the attacker.

desc.cn: 借助喷气装置跳起并朝前砸下盾牌，对范围内的敌人造成大量<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>，并生成一个持续数秒的<@ba.key>冰雪地带</>持续对敌人造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。敌人身处<@ba.key>冰雪地带</>内一段时间后将被强制<#ba.frozen>冻结</>。
desc.en: Leaps into mid-air with a jetpack before slamming down with her shield to deal massive <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> to enemies in the area of effect. Also generates a <@ba.key>Snow Zone</> (lasting several seconds) that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> over time to enemies. The <@ba.key>Snow Zone</> forcibly applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> to enemies caught within it for a certain duration.

desc.cn:
当处于<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>或<#ba.fracture>碎甲</>状态的敌人受到主控干员<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>后可以发动。
施放身外身以长枪突刺，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，并且获得<#ba.combo>连击</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on an enemy with <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</> or <#ba.fracture>Breach</>. 
Unleashes an aspect that performs a spear thrust to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and grants <#ba.combo>Link</>.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
连续向前挥枪，造成2次<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，之后重砸地面，再次对前方所有敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>。
最后一击命中的敌人若不处于<#ba.noguard>破防</>状态，则额外对其施加<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>。
desc.en:
Swings the polearm multiple times to deal 2 hits of <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>, then slams the ground to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> to all enemies in the area of effect. 
If the enemy struck by the last hit of this skill has no <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, apply <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</> to the said enemy instead.

desc.cn:
施放身外身，使用不动杵重砸前方地面，对大范围内的所有敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并造成造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>，然后将所有敌人聚拢至中心。一段时间后，对仍然留在砸地范围内的所有敌人再次造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>。
若该技能<#ba.consume>消耗</>了<#ba.combo>连击</>，则会追加大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
desc.en:
Unleashes an aspect that slams an Immovable Vajra to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> to all enemies in a large area of effect, then enemies are drawn toward the center of the area. After a while, enemies still within the vajra slam area of effect will suffer another massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</>. 
If the skill <#ba.consume>consumes</> a <#ba.combo>Link</>, it deals additional massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

desc.cn:
当有敌人进入<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态时可以发动。
让所有处于<#ba.burning>燃烧</>或<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态的敌人脚下喷出火焰，对其造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。
如果命中敌人，会获得1层<@ba.key>熔火</>。每命中1个敌人，还会额外获得终结技能量。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy suffers <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>. 
Fire erupts beneath the feet of any enemy with <#ba.burning>Combustion</> or <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>, dealing <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> to them. 
If the skill hits the enemy, Laevatain gains 1 stack of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</> and further gains Ultimate Energy per enemy hit.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
召唤熔核碎片持续攻击前方敌人，造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。如果命中敌人，会获得1层<@ba.key>熔火</>。 
如果施放时已拥有{count:0}层<@ba.key>熔火</>，则最后会消耗所有层数，对大范围内敌人追加1次攻击，造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>并强制施加短暂的<#ba.burning>燃烧</>。 
追加攻击命中敌人会额外获得终结技能量。
<@ba.info>终结技期间，战技效果增强。</>
desc.en:
Summons a Magma Fragment to continuously attack enemies and deal <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>. Hitting the enemy grants 1 stack of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</>. 
If Laevatain already has {count:0} stack(s) of <@ba.key>Melting Flame</> when casting the skill, then consume all the stacks and perform 1 additional attack that deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> and forcibly trigger temporary <#ba.burning>Combustion</> to all enemies in a large area.
When the additional attack hits the enemy, restore additional Ultimate Energy.
<@ba.info>Battle skill effects are enhanced while Laevatain's ultimate is active.</>

desc.cn:
召唤烈焰魔剑并切换为主控角色。
一段时间内，普通攻击得到强化，烈焰魔剑会协同莱万汀发动攻击，每次攻击造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。此外，普通攻击第3段会施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。
desc.en:
Laevatain summons her Sviga Lævi and becomes the controlled operator. 
For a certain duration, her basic attacks (BATK) are enhanced and the Sviga Lævi strikes together with Laevatain, with each attack dealing <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>. BATK sequence 3 also applies <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>.

desc.cn:
当主控干员对处于<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态的敌人造成<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>时可以发动。
立即在敌人旁部署一个速冻仔，速冻仔会不断施放能量攻击周围的敌人，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并持续向中心<@ba.key>牵引</>。持续时间结束后，速冻仔自爆，对周围敌人强制施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>并造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
连携技成功命中敌人后，会额外获得终结技能量，命中多名目标时仅获得1次。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on an enemy with <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>.
Immediately deploys Frost-e-Bytee next to the enemy. While active, Frost-e-Bytee constantly releases energy to attack nearby enemies, deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> to them, and <@ba.key>pulls</> them towards itself. After Frost-e-Bytee expires, it explodes to forcibly apply <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> and deal <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> to nearby enemies.
After the combo skill successfully hits the enemy, Yvonne gains additional Ultimate Energy. This Ultimate Energy Gain effect can only trigger 1 time, even if the skill hits multiple enemies.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。
 
下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
 
处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
向前发射一颗制冷弹。制冷弹碰到敌人后会发生爆炸，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。命中处于<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>或<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>的敌人时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>掉目标身上所有的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>，对其强制施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>，并基于<#ba.consume>消耗</>的层数造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
战技成功施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>后，会基于<#ba.consume>消耗</>的层数，额外获得终结技能量，命中多名目标时仅获得1次。
desc.en:
Throws a freezing bomb. The bomb explodes when it hits the enemy to deal <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>. If hitting an enemy with <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> or <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>, then <#ba.consume>consume</> all <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks, forcibly apply <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>, and deal <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> to the target based on the number of stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</>.
After the battle skill successfully applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>, Yvonne gains additional Ultimate Energy based on the number of stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</>. This Ultimate Energy Gain effect can only trigger 1 time, even if the skill hits multiple enemies.

desc.cn:
立即部署小嘀嗒进行辅助，并切换至主控干员。
在接下来一定时间内，伊冯的普通攻击会得到<@ba.key>强化</>，每次普通攻击都会增加自己的暴击率。当叠加至最大层数后，自身暴击伤害增加。持续时间结束前的最后一次普通攻击会变为<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>，造成大量<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
如果敌人处于<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态，额外造成一次<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>后，<#ba.consume>消耗</>其<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态。
desc.en:
Immediately deploys the support bot Tink-a-Bella and makes Yvonne the controlled operator.
Temporarily <@ba.key>enhances</> Yvonne's basic attack (BATK). Each BATK sequence performed grants a stack of Critical Rate buff. After reaching max stacks, Yvonne also gains a Critical DMG buff. When the skill is about to end, Yvonne's last BATK becomes a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> that deals massive <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>.
If the enemy is <#ba.frozen>Solidified</>, Yvonne performs an additional attack that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and then <#ba.consume>consumes</> the enemy's <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>.

desc.cn:
当有敌人达到4层<#ba.noguard>破防</>时可以发动。
抡起铁锅对敌人造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并<#ba.crush>猛击</>，本次<#ba.crush>猛击</>的伤害获得额外提升。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy reaches 4 stacks of <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</>. 
Swings the wok at the enemy to deal massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.crush>Crush</>. This <#ba.crush>Crush</> also deals more DMG.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
 
处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 掏出铁锅进行短暂蓄力后，用力向上颠勺，对敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>与<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
desc.en: Takes out a wok, quickly charges it up, and performs a powerful wok flip that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and <#ba.airborne>Lift</> to the enemy.

desc.cn: 猛拍砧板，立即对前方范围内的敌人强制造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。随后发动6段连续斩击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，最后将所有敌人一并击坠，强制造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
desc.en: Da Pan slams the chopping board to forcibly <#ba.airborne>Lift</> all enemies in the area of effect in front of him. This is followed by a 6-sequence flurry of slashes that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. The final step is to bash every enemy to the ground to forcibly <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> and deal massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to them.

desc.cn:
当有敌人失衡，或触发<#ba.poiseknot>失衡节点</>时可以发动。
进行来回2段突刺，每段造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy becomes Staggered or hits a <#ba.poiseknot>Stagger Node</>. 
Performs a returning dash with 2 thrust sequences, with each sequence dealing <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovering some SP.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 向前方挥斩，造成<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>并施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>。
desc.en: A frontal slash that deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> and applies <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>.

desc.cn: 进入持续施法状态，发射3枚集结信号弹，每次发射恢复一定技力。
desc.en: Enters a channeling state and fires 3 Rallying Flares. Each firing recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
当敌人开始蓄力，或主控干员受到攻击后生命值低于{trigger_hp_ratio:0%}可以发动。
挥拳向前用力扣下，对敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，并使自身和另一名友方干员（主控干员优先）获得<#ba.shield>护盾</>。
防御力可以额外提高护盾值。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy starts charging up a skill, or when the controlled operator is attacked and falls below {trigger_hp_ratio:0%} HP. 
A powerful downward punch that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to the enemy, while granting <#ba.shield>shields</> to self and another teammate (controlled operator prioritized).
DEF can further increase Shield points.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
架起盾牌格挡攻击，使自身及周围干员获得<#ba.guard>庇护</>，并立即<#ba.return>返还</>一定技力。
若在立盾期间受到攻击，则发动一次反击，尝试对敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并施加1层<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
desc.en:
Raises a shield that can block attacks, grants <#ba.guard>Protection</> to self and nearby operators, and immediately <#ba.return>returns</> some SP. 
When attacked while the said shield is raised, perform a retaliation bash that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and applies 1 stack of <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> to the attacking enemy.

desc.cn: 挥动大剑快速向前斩击2次，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并施加<#ba.weak>虚弱</>。最后向下猛砸，对目标范围内的所有敌人造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并造成<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>。
desc.en: Swings the greatsword to perform 2 consecutive slashes to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and apply <#ba.weak>Weaken</>, followed by a powerful downward slam that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and applies <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> to all enemies within the area of effect.

desc.cn:
当有敌人进入<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态时可以发动。
迅速移动到敌人身边，对小范围内的敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并强制造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。如果命中处于<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态的敌人，还会造成额外伤害并施加<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy suffers <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>. 
Quickly moves to the enemy's side to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and forcibly <#ba.airborne>Lift</> enemies in a small area. If the skill hits a target with <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>, the skill deals additional DMG and applies <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</>.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 向前刺出长枪，激发出一道制冷声波，对一条直线上的敌人造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
desc.en: A lance thrust that fires a stream of freezing sound waves that deal <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and apply <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> to all enemies along its straight path.

desc.cn: 耗尽全身力气，用力下砸枪柄，对自身附近圆形范围的敌人造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。如果敌人处于<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>状态，则对其强制造成<#ba.airborne>击飞</>。
desc.en: Estella expends all her strength to unleash a powerful slam of the spear shaft, dealing <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to all enemies in a circular area around self. To enemies with <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</>, the skill forcibly applies <#ba.airborne>Lift</> to them.

desc.cn:
当敌人进入2层及以上<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>或<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>时可以发动。
射击目标敌人，引发一次特殊爆炸，造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并施加该<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy has 2 or more stacks of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> or <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>. 
Shoots the target enemy to trigger a special explosion that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and applies another <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> of the element already on the enemy.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{attack_poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{attack_poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
踢出<@ba.key>自制炸弹</>将其黏附在目标身上，并施加<#ba.slow>缓速</>，短暂延迟后爆炸对范围内的敌人造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>。若黏附目标被击败则<@ba.key>自制炸弹</>提前爆炸。
<@ba.info>场上同时只能存在一个自制炸弹。</>
desc.en:
Kicks an <@ba.key>Improvised Explosive</> that sticks to the target, applying <#ba.slow>Slow</> and exploding after a short duration. The explosion deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> to enemies in the area of effect. Defeating the target also sets off the <@ba.key>Improvised Explosive</> immediately.
<@ba.info>Only 1 Improvised Explosive can be present in the battlefield.</>

desc.cn:
萤石以弧形轨迹高速运动并向弧内目标快速射击，造成4段<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>，若命中目标身上粘有<@ba.key>自制炸弹</>，则立刻将其引爆并提升爆炸伤害及范围。
若最后一段伤害命中处于2层及以上<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>或<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>的目标，则再次施加该<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>。
desc.en:
Fluorite quickly moves in an arc and rapidly fires at the target within the arc to deal 4 sequences of <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>. If an <@ba.key>Improvised Explosive</> has been stuck to the target, the skill detonates it immediately and increases the DMG and size of the explosion.
If the final DMG sequence hits a target with at least 2 stacks of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> or <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>, then apply the same <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> again.

desc.cn:
当被<@ba.key>聚焦</>的敌人进入<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>或<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态时可以发动。
在该敌人身上引发1次能量爆炸，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>并再次对其施加该<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>或<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy with active <@ba.key>Focus</> suffers a <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>. 
Triggers 1 energy explosion on the enemy that deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and applies another stack of the same <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 对敌人施加长时间<@ba.key>聚焦</>，造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>，被<@ba.key>聚焦</>的敌人受到<#ba.pulsevul>电磁脆弱</>和<#ba.firevul>灼热脆弱</>，同时最多<@ba.key>聚焦</>1个敌人。
desc.en: Applies <@ba.key>Focus</> with a long duration on the enemy and deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>. An enemy with an active <@ba.key>Focus</> also suffers <#ba.pulsevul>Electric Susceptibility</> and <#ba.firevul>Heat Susceptibility</>. <@ba.key>Focus</> can only be applied to 1 enemy at any given time.

desc.cn: 对全队施加一段时间的<#ba.pulseenhance>电磁增幅</>和<#ba.fireenhance>灼热增幅</>。
desc.en: Applies temporary <#ba.pulseenhance>Electric Amp</> and <#ba.fireenhance>Heat Amp</> to the entire team.

desc.cn:
当附近目标的<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>或<#ba.originium>源石结晶</>被<#ba.consume>消耗</>时可以发动。
在敌人脚下开洞垂钓，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，并恢复一定技力，有一定概率能钓出<@ba.key>珍鳞</>，大幅增加伤害并额外恢复技力。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When the <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reaction</> or <#ba.originium>Originium Crystals</> of a nearby target is <#ba.consume>consumed</>. 
Opens an angling hole beneath the enemy that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP. The skill has a chance to hook a <@ba.key>Rare Fin</> that greatly increases the DMG dealt and recovers some more SP.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 勾起冰块砸击面前的敌人，对目标造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。命中处于<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>状态的目标时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>掉目标身上所有<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>，对其强制施加<#ba.frozen>冻结</>，并基于<#ba.consume>消耗</>层数恢复技力，命中多名目标时仅恢复1次。
desc.en: Hooks a block of ice and slams it to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to the enemy target. When hitting a target with <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>, Alesh <#ba.consume>consumes</> all of the target's <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> stacks, forcibly applies <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> to the target, and recovers some SP based on the number of stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</>. This SP recovery effect can only trigger 1 time, even if the skill hits multiple enemies.

desc.cn: 钓起超乎想象的大鳞砸击面前的所有敌人，造成大范围的<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>，施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>并恢复一定技力，每击败一个目标将额外恢复一定技力。
desc.en: Alesh hooks a fin of unbelievable size and slams it to deal <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and apply <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> to enemies in a large area of effect in front of him. He recovers some SP on hit, with additional SP gained for each target defeated.

desc.cn:
当主控干员对<@ba.key>不处于</><#ba.noguard>破防</>或<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人造成<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>后可以发动。
发射一团火山云抛向目标敌人，到达目标身边后对目标造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。火山云会跟踪目标，短暂延迟后爆炸，对周围其他敌人造成一半的<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>，并强制施加短暂的<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When the controlled operator performs a <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> on an enemy with <@ba.key>no</> stacks of <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> or <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>. 
Launches a homing Volcanic Cloud at a target enemy that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> when close enough to the target. The Volcanic Cloud explodes after a short delay, dealing half of the <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and forcibly applying temporary <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> to nearby enemies.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 骑上多利先生冲撞目标，对目标造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>，若目标处于<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态，<#ba.consume>消耗</>其<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态，并对其施加<#ba.physicalvul>物理脆弱</>与<#ba.spellvul>法术脆弱</>。
desc.en: Hops on Mr. Dolly and rams the target to deal <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>. If the target has <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>, then <#ba.consume>consume</> the <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> and apply <#ba.physicalvul>Physical Susceptibility</> and <#ba.spellvul>Arts Susceptibility</> to the target.

desc.cn: 艾尔黛拉进入可移动的持续施法状态，召唤多利先生的帮助，随机向四周散射多利先生的分身。每个分身命中敌人时对其造成<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>，每个敌人每{interval:0.0}秒最多受到一次伤害。
desc.en: Ardelia enters a mobile channeling state and summons the aid of Mr. Dolly. Multiple copies of Mr. Dolly are thrown in random directions. Each copy deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>. Each enemy can only take 1 damaging hit every {interval:0.0}s.

desc.cn:
当有敌人进入{count:0}层及以上<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>状态时可以发动。
在目标敌人身上凝结冰锥，随后将其斩碎，<#ba.consume>消耗</>敌人身上的所有<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>，对其造成基于其<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>层数的<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>，并且根据<#ba.consume>消耗</>的层数获得终结技能量。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When an enemy has {count:0} or more <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> stacks. 
Encases the target enemy in icicles and shatters them to <#ba.consume>consume</> all <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> stacks of the said enemy. The number of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</> determines the amount of <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> dealt to the said enemy and Ultimate Energy gained by Last Rite.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多4段攻击，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。

下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。

处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 4 sequences that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher that deals massive <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn:
对主控干员的武器进行<@ba.key>低温灌注</>，并<#ba.return>返还</>一定技力。
一段时间内，当前主控干员接下来的1次<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会生成别礼的幻影，对目标进行追击，造成<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>，施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>。
主控干员为别礼时，施放该战技不会中断普通攻击。
desc.en:
Performs a <@ba.key>Hypothermic Perfusion</> on the controlled operator's weapon and <#ba.return>returns</> some SP. 
The next <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> performed by the currently controlled operator within a certain duration creates Last Rite's Mirages that unleash an additional attack at the target. This attack deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> and applies <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>. 
When the controlled operator is Last Rite herself, casting this battle skill does not reset her basic attack sequence.

desc.cn:
披着霜铠，凝结冰镰，对前方进行三次斩击，该状态下免疫所有伤害。
每次斩击造成大量<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
<@ba.info>别礼只能从自身的战技、连携技中获得终结技能量。</>
desc.en:
Last Rite encases herself in frost armor, creates an ice scythe to perform 3 slashes, and gains immunity to all damages while this state is active. 
Each slash deals massive <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>. 
<@ba.info>Last Rite can only gain Ultimate Energy from her own battle skills and combo skills.</>

desc.cn:
当有敌人被<#ba.crush>猛击</>或者<#ba.fracture>碎甲</><#ba.consume>消耗</><#ba.noguard>破防</>层数后可以发动。
根据<#ba.consume>消耗</>的最高<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，对敌人进行相同段数的斩击（最多3段），造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力，每一击的伤害和技力恢复效果都更强。
<@ba.info>若消耗4层破防，第3段斩击将获得强化。</>
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When <#ba.crush>Crush</> or <#ba.fracture>Breach</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> the enemy's <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack(s). 
Performs a number of slash sequences (up to 3) based on the max number of <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</>, dealing <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovering some SP. Each slash deals more DMG and gives better SP recovery. 
<@ba.info>Consuming 4 stacks of Vulnerability enhances the 3rd slash sequence.</>

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。
 
下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
 
处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 对前方范围的敌人进行两段斩击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并施加<#ba.fracture>碎甲</>，同时基于<#ba.consume>消耗</>的破防层数恢复技力，命中多名目标时仅恢复1次。
desc.en: Pogranichnik performs a 2-sequence slash attack at enemies in front of him, dealing <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>, applying <#ba.fracture>Breach</>, and recovering SP based on the number of Vulnerability stacks <#ba.consume>consumed</>. The SP recovery effect can only trigger 1 time, even if the skill hits multiple targets.

desc.cn: 以目标为中心，召唤四名盾卫向目标进军，并将进军途中的敌人往目标方向推动，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>的同时生成5点<@ba.key>铁誓</>。当有敌人受到<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>效果或骏卫的连携技伤害后，消耗1点<@ba.key>铁誓</>召唤一名盾卫对其发动袭扰，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。当消耗的<@ba.key>铁誓</>是最后一点时，四名盾卫发动决胜，对其造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复大量技力。
desc.en: Summons 4 Shieldguards to advance and push all enemies along the way towards the target, dealing <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> while generating 5 points of <@ba.key>Steel Oath</>. After an enemy suffers a <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or takes DMG from Pogranichnik's combo skill, Pogranichnik consumes 1 point of <@ba.key>Steel Oath</> and summons 1 Shieldguard to harass the said enemy, dealing <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovering some SP. When the last <@ba.key>Steel Oath</> point is consumed, all 4 Shieldguards will initiate a Decisive Assault that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to the target while recovering plenty of SP.

desc.cn:
当小队内其他干员的连携技造成伤害时可以发动。
冲到敌人身边，对其造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，并附着<#ba.originium>源石结晶</>，在一段时间内将其封印。施加<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>或<#ba.noguard>破防</>会<#ba.consume>消耗</><#ba.originium>源石结晶</>并额外造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
desc.en:
COMBO TRIGGER: When another operator in the team deals DMG with combo skills. 
Rushes to the enemy's side to deal <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and attach <#ba.originium>Originium Crystals</> that temporarily seal them. Applying <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> to the sealed enemy <#ba.consume>consumes</> the <#ba.originium>Originium Crystals</> and deals additional <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

desc.cn:
普通攻击：
对敌人进行至多5段攻击，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。作为主控干员时，<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>会造成<@ba.poise>{poise:0}</>点失衡。
 
下落攻击：
处于空中时使用普通攻击，会下落并攻击附近敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
 
处决攻击：
附近有敌人处于失衡状态时使用普通攻击，将处决该敌人，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>并恢复一定技力。
desc.en:
BASIC ATTACK: 
An attack with up to 5 sequences that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>. As the controlled operator, <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also deals <@ba.poise>{poise:0}</> Stagger. 

DIVE ATTACK: 
Basic attack performed in mid-air becomes a dive attack that deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to nearby enemies. 

FINISHER: 
Basic attack performed near a Staggered enemy becomes a finisher attack that deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and recovers some SP.

desc.cn: 使用源石技艺冲击前方一定范围内的敌人，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>和<#ba.crush>猛击</>。
desc.en: A forceful burst of Originium Arts that attacks enemies within the area of effect. Deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and applies <#ba.crush>Crush</>.

desc.cn: 使用源石技艺轰击地面，对前方扇形范围内的敌人造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。如果敌人身上附着<#ba.originium>源石结晶</>，则<#ba.consume>消耗</><#ba.originium>源石结晶</>并额外造成一次<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
desc.en: Bombards the ground with Originium Arts, dealing massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> to all enemies within a fan-shaped area. If the enemy has <#ba.originium>Originium Crystals</> on them, this skill <#ba.consume>consumes</> the <#ba.originium>Originium Crystals</> and deals one more hit of <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.
